Canopy tower by green-brick structure, each layer has a high tower, layer decreases from the bottom to the top. Tower, brackets highlight, hierarchy.
address=500 meters east of the intersection of the National Road 312 and East Binhe Road

content=The Sunlight Hotel (Jinyangguang Dajiudian) is situated about 500 meters west of the intersection of the National Road 312 and East Binhe Road.
Guests of this Nanyang hotel can choose from a variety of accommodations including standard rooms, deluxe rooms and deluxe suites.
In terms of dining, the on-site restaurants serve Cantonese, Hunan and Henan dishes. Additionally, there are private dining rooms ready for booking.Well-equipped conference rooms are suitable for hosting meetings, seminars or other events.
When it comes to refreshment, guests can take a sauna, go to the karaoke hall, or play ping-pong.
